description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的群雄之一，出自凉州军阀，是继董卓之后的权臣。性格勇猛诡谲，善于用兵，有辩才。官至大司马、车骑将军、司隶校尉，爵位为池阳侯。
description.en: A warlord during the late Eastern Han dynasty from Liang Province, and a successor to Dong Zhuo's power. He was known for his ferocity, cunning, and military skill, as well as his eloquence. He held high offices including Grand Marshal, General of Chariots and Cavalry, and Colonel-Director of Retainers, and was enfeoffed as the Marquis of Chiyang.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年董卓的部将，与李傕一同攻入长安，挟持汉献帝。后与李傕反目，最终被部将伍习所杀。
description.en: A general under the warlord Dong Zhuo during the late Eastern Han dynasty. He, along with Li Jue, captured Chang'an and held Emperor Xian hostage. He later had a falling out with Li Jue and was eventually killed by his subordinate Wu Xi.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣、军阀，李傕、郭汜等人的原主帅，后被吕布、王允所杀。
description.en: A powerful minister and warlord during the late Eastern Han dynasty, the original commander of Li Jue, Guo Si, and others. He was later assassinated by Lu Bu and Wang Yun.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期谋士。曾为李傕的谋士，献策攻取长安。
description.en: An advisor from the late Eastern Han dynasty to the Three Kingdoms period. He served as an advisor to Li Jue and devised the strategy to capture Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名将，与王允合谋刺杀董卓，后被李傕、郭汜联军击败，逃离长安。
description.en: A famous general of the late Eastern Han dynasty. He conspired with Wang Yun to assassinate Dong Zhuo, but was later defeated by the allied forces of Li Jue and Guo Si and fled Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，与吕布合谋刺杀董卓，后被攻入长安的李傕所杀。
description.en: An official of the late Eastern Han dynasty. He conspired with Lu Bu to assassinate Dong Zhuo and was later killed by Li Jue after the latter captured Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 东汉最后一位皇帝，先后被董卓、李傕、郭汜、曹操等人挟持控制。
description.en: The last emperor of the Eastern Han dynasty, who was held hostage and controlled successively by warlords such as Dong Zhuo, Li Jue, Guo Si, and Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 董卓死后，其部将李傕、郭汜等人反攻长安，掌控朝廷并造成关中地区动乱的时期。
description.en: The period of turmoil in the Guanzhong region after Dong Zhuo's death, when his generals Li Jue and Guo Si counter-attacked Chang'an, seized control of the imperial court.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年董卓的部将，与李傕、郭汜一同攻占长安，后在攻打穰城时战死。
description.en: A general under the warlord Dong Zhuo during the late Eastern Han dynasty. He participated in the capture of Chang'an with Li Jue and Guo Si. He was later killed in action while attacking Rangcheng.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年董卓的部将，与李傕等人一同专政，后因李傕猜忌而被其设计杀害。
description.en: A general under the warlord Dong Zhuo during the late Eastern Han dynasty. He ruled jointly with Li Jue and others, but was later killed in a plot by Li Jue due to suspicion.

description.zh-cn: 董卓的女婿，曾是李傕的上级。
description.en: Dong Zhuo's son-in-law and a superior of Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名将，曾与李傕交战并被其击败。
description.en: A famous general of the late Eastern Han dynasty who fought against and was defeated by Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 董卓旧部，董卓死后受王允派遣迎击李傕，兵败战死。
description.en: A former subordinate of Dong Zhuo. After Dong Zhuo's death, he was dispatched by Wang Yun to intercept Li Jue but was defeated and killed in battle.

description.zh-cn: 董卓旧部，董卓死后受王允派遣与徐荣一同迎击李傕，后率部投降。
description.en: A former subordinate of Dong Zhuo. After Dong Zhuo's death, he was dispatched by Wang Yun along with Xu Rong to intercept Li Jue, but later surrendered with his troops.

description.zh-cn: 董卓旧部，与李傕等人会合围攻长安，后与樊稠一同被李傕杀害。
description.en: A former subordinate of Dong Zhuo. He joined Li Jue and others in besieging Chang'an and was later killed by Li Jue along with Fan Chou.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年西凉军阀，曾联合韩遂攻打李傕，但被击败。
description.en: A warlord from Xiliang during the late Eastern Han dynasty. He once allied with Han Sui to attack Li Jue, but was defeated.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年西凉军阀，曾联合马腾攻打李傕，但被击败。
description.en: A warlord from Xiliang during the late Eastern Han dynasty. He once allied with Ma Teng to attack Li Jue, but was defeated.

description.zh-cn: 李傕的外甥，任骑都尉，受李傕之命在会议上刺杀了樊稠和李蒙。
description.en: Li Jue's nephew, who served as a Commandant of Cavalry. On Li Jue's orders, he assassinated Fan Chou and Li Meng during a meeting.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，在汉献帝东归后将其迎至许都，并派遣官吏率军讨伐并最终消灭了李傕势力。
description.en: A powerful minister of the late Eastern Han dynasty. After Emperor Xian's return to the east, he welcomed him to Xudu and dispatched officials to lead forces to attack and ultimately eliminate Li Jue's faction.

description.zh-cn: 曹操麾下官员，任谒者仆射，曾奉命率领关中诸将讨伐李傕。
description.en: An official under Cao Cao, serving as Ye Zhe Pu She. He was ordered to lead the generals of Guanzhong to campaign against Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 关中将领，参与讨伐李傕，并最终将其击败斩杀。
description.en: A general from the Guanzhong region who participated in the campaign against Li Jue and ultimately defeated and killed him.

description.zh-cn: 关中将领，参与讨伐李傕，并最终将其击败斩杀。
description.en: A general from the Guanzhong region who participated in the campaign against Li Jue and ultimately defeated and killed him.

description.zh-cn: 关中将领，参与讨伐李傕。贾诩曾短暂投奔于他。
description.en: A general from the Guanzhong region who participated in the campaign against Li Jue. Jia Xu briefly took refuge with him.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的首都，曾被李傕、郭汜等人攻占。
description.en: The capital city during the late Eastern Han dynasty, which was captured by Li Jue, Guo Si, and others.

description.zh-cn: 郭汜的部将，后将其杀害。
description.en: A subordinate general of Guo Si, whom he later assassinated.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期的一个郡，是李傕的出生地。
description.en: A commandery during the Eastern Han dynasty, and the birthplace of Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 李傕的儿子。
description.en: Son of Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 李傕的侄子。
description.en: Nephew of Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 李傕的侄子，曾劫持汉献帝至李傕营中。
description.en: Nephew of Li Jue, who once abducted Emperor Xian to Li Jue's camp.

description.zh-cn: 李傕是董卓的部将，在董卓死后成为其势力的继承者之一。
description.en: Li Jue was a general under Dong Zhuo and became one of the successors to his power after Dong Zhuo's death.

description.zh-cn: 董卓死后，贾诩劝说李傕等人不要解散部队，而是率军攻打长安为董卓报仇，并献上“奉国家以正天下”之策，李傕采纳了其建议。
description.en: After Dong Zhuo's death, Jia Xu persuaded Li Jue and others not to disband their troops but to attack Chang'an to avenge Dong Zhuo, proposing the strategy of 'upholding the state to rectify the world,' which Li Jue adopted.

description.zh-cn: 董卓死后，李傕与郭汜、张济等人合作，一同率军攻入长安，挟持汉献帝，共同专政。
description.en: After Dong Zhuo's death, Li Jue cooperated with Guo Si, Zhang Ji, and others to lead an army into Chang'an, hold Emperor Xian hostage, and jointly control the government.

description.zh-cn: 兴平二年（195年），李傕与郭汜因权力争斗及妻妾挑拨而反目，率兵相互攻击，交战数月，死伤数以万计。
description.en: In 195, Li Jue and Guo Si turned against each other due to power struggles and incitement from their wives. They led their troops into mutual conflict, fighting for several months with tens of thousands of casualties.

description.zh-cn: 李傕率军攻入长安后，与吕布发生巷战，最终击败吕布，迫使其逃离长安。
description.en: After leading his army into Chang'an, Li Jue engaged in street fighting with Lu Bu, ultimately defeating him and forcing him to flee the city.

description.zh-cn: 李傕攻陷长安后，杀害了与吕布合谋刺杀董卓的王允，并族灭其三族。
description.en: After capturing Chang'an, Li Jue executed Wang Yun, who had conspired with Lu Bu to assassinate Dong Zhuo, and exterminated his entire clan.

description.zh-cn: 李傕与郭汜等人攻占长安后，挟持汉献帝，掌控了东汉朝廷并专政。
description.en: After capturing Chang'an, Li Jue, along with Guo Si and others, held Emperor Xian hostage, seizing control of the Eastern Han court and establishing a dictatorship.

description.zh-cn: 李傕是李郭之乱的主要发动者和领导者之一。
description.en: Li Jue was one of the main instigators and leaders of the Rebellion of Li Jue and Guo Si.

description.zh-cn: 李傕曾被董卓的女婿牛辅派遣至中牟与朱俊交战。
description.en: Li Jue was once dispatched by Dong Zhuo's son-in-law, Niu Fu, to engage Zhu Jun in Zhongmou.

description.zh-cn: 李傕在中牟与朱俊交战，并成功击破对方。
description.en: Li Jue engaged and defeated Zhu Jun in battle at Zhongmou.

description.zh-cn: 王允派董卓旧部徐荣在新丰迎击李傕，结果徐荣战死。
description.en: Wang Yun dispatched former Dong Zhuo subordinate Xu Rong to intercept Li Jue at Xinfeng, resulting in Xu Rong's death in battle.

description.zh-cn: 胡轸原与徐荣一同迎击李傕，但在徐荣战死后，胡轸率部投降李傕。
description.en: Hu Zhen initially joined Xu Rong to intercept Li Jue, but after Xu Rong was killed in battle, Hu Zhen surrendered to Li Jue with his troops.

description.zh-cn: 李傕与董卓旧部樊稠等人会合，共同围攻长安并专政。
description.en: Li Jue joined forces with former Dong Zhuo subordinate Fan Chou and others to besiege Chang'an and jointly control the government.

description.zh-cn: 兴平二年（195年），李傕因猜忌樊稠勇而得人心，且不满其曾私放韩遂，于是在会议上将其刺死。
description.en: In 195, Li Jue, suspicious of Fan Chou's bravery and popularity, and resentful of him for previously releasing Han Sui, had him assassinated during a meeting.

description.zh-cn: 兴平二年（195年），李傕在会议上将李蒙与樊稠一同刺死。
description.en: In 195, Li Jue had Li Meng assassinated along with Fan Chou during a meeting.

description.zh-cn: 兴平元年（194年），马腾联合韩遂攻打李傕，被李傕派兵击败。
description.en: In 194, Ma Teng allied with Han Sui to attack Li Jue, but was defeated by forces dispatched by Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 兴平元年（194年），韩遂联合马腾攻打李傕，被李傕派兵击败。
description.en: In 194, Han Sui allied with Ma Teng to attack Li Jue, but was defeated by forces dispatched by Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 胡封是李傕的外甥。
description.en: Hu Feng was Li Jue's nephew.

description.zh-cn: 胡封受其舅李傕之命，在会议上刺杀了樊稠。
description.en: Under the orders of his uncle Li Jue, Hu Feng assassinated Fan Chou during a meeting.

description.zh-cn: 建安二年（197年），曹操派谒者仆射裴茂率领关中诸将讨伐李傕，并于次年将其势力消灭。
description.en: In 197, Cao Cao dispatched the Ye Zhe Pu She Pei Mao to lead the generals of Guanzhong on a punitive expedition against Li Jue, eliminating his forces the following year.

description.zh-cn: 裴茂奉曹操之命，率领段煨、梁兴、张横等关中诸将讨伐并消灭了李傕。
description.en: Under Cao Cao's orders, Pei Mao led Guanzhong generals such as Duan Wei, Liang Xing, and Zhang Heng to attack and eliminate Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 建安三年（198年），梁兴与张横等人合力击败并斩杀了李傕。
description.en: In 198, Liang Xing, along with Zhang Heng and others, joined forces to defeat and execute Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 建安三年（198年），张横与梁兴等人合力击败并斩杀了李傕。
description.en: In 198, Zhang Heng, along with Liang Xing and others, joined forces to defeat and execute Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 建安二年（197年），郭汜被其部将伍习所杀。
description.en: In 197, Guo Si was killed by his subordinate general, Wu Xi.

description.zh-cn: 李式是李傕的儿子。
description.en: Li Shi was the son of Li Jue.

description.zh-cn: 李利是李傕兄长之子。
description.en: Li Li was the son of Li Jue's older brother.

description.zh-cn: 李暹是李傕兄长之子。
description.en: Li Xian was the son of Li Jue's older brother.
